des:
With this skill you can finally use your Flics to trigger your Alexa Routines!

Control your lights, music, and appliances at the push of a button. Keep it simple for even the youngest family members to understand.

ARE MY FLICS COMPATIBLE?

- Both the original Flic and the Flic 2 are compatible.
- The Alexa action is available on Android and iOS, as well as on the Flic Hub and Flic Hub LR.

HOW DO I SET IT UP?

1. Enable this skill in the Alexa app and, when prompted, log in using your Flic account.
2. Head over to the Flic app and add the Alexa action to one or more trigger on your Flic button. Alexa should automatically detect these buttons as new devices once saved.
3. In the Alexa app, go to Devices -> All Devices and verify that the Flic that you want to set up is shown in the list.
4. Navigate to More -> Routines and then either create a new routine, or select an existing one. To setup Flic as a trigger, select "When this happens" -> "Smart Home" and then choose your Flic.
5. That's it! It is up to you what you choose to do with the routine.
